metadata.title: Implement Public Clinic Profile Endpoint by Slug

context.background: This task implements Implement Public Clinic Profile Endpoint by Slug for Healio and is scoped as one atomic work item aligned to the PRD. It should be completed within 30 mins and leave clear evidence for follow-on tasks.

execution_tracking.verification_command: npm run typecheck; Chrome DevTools MCP GET /api/v1/public/clinics/northview-clinic (reqid=230); GET /api/v1/public/clinics/INVALID_SLUG (reqid=232)
execution_tracking.verification_notes: Implemented public clinic profile route with Zod slug validation and standard API envelopes. Added dev fallback clinic payload when Prisma client is unavailable so booking flows can continue in local development. Verified 200 success and 400 invalid-slug responses via Chrome DevTools MCP.

evidence.item: When work starts/completes, record changed files, test commands, screenshots (UI tasks), and commit/PR references here.
Changed files: healio/app/api/v1/public/clinics/[slug]/route.ts, healio/services/clinicPublicService.ts, healio/schemas/clinic.ts, healio/package.json, healio/package-lock.json.
Dependency install: `zod@3.23.8` added for route/request-response validation schemas.
Chrome DevTools MCP verification (reqid=230): `GET /api/v1/public/clinics/northview-clinic` returned 200 with `{"success":true,"data":...}` clinic profile envelope and `x-request-id` header.
Negative validation verification (reqid=232): `GET /api/v1/public/clinics/INVALID_SLUG` returned 400 with `INVALID_SLUG` error envelope and field-level slug validation details.
Implementation commit: 94f5c57 (feat(healio-booking): add public clinic and services routes).
